summary: A collection of 31 spells that allow mages at high levels to stand a chance against upper level enemies. Some spells are geared for low levels, but most are master or expert level spells.
descriptionHtml:
Masterful Magic Spell Pack
	By ThePaladinOf

v1 Spells:
[youtube]q1iDknFev-Q&feature=plcp[/youtube]

v1.1 New Spells:
[youtube]nnFYIL_2NDg[/youtube]

Please note: I will not be uploading a video for v1.2 as only one new spell is added. I will make a video if any additional updates are made. Thank you.
========================================
Table of Contents:
1)Introduction
2)Mod Usage
3)Installation
4)Credits and Contact
5)IF UPDATING-Read here
========================================
1)Introduction
This mod is the result of my attempt to add some higher level spells into the game. Most of these spells are \"Paladin\" style,
but a few are typical spells. They are as follows.

1)Summon Hagraven- Summon Hagraven for 60 seconds
2)Summon Wispmother- Summon Wispmother for 60 seconds
3)Lesser Beam of Light- A Beam of Light that does 25 pts damage
4)Greater Beam of Light- A Beam of Light that does 50 pts damage
5)Dawnbreaker- Repel and damage very high level undead.
6)Flame Barrier- Shoot a wall of flame infront of you that does 50pts damage.
7)Greater Ironclad: Heavy Armor- Fortify heavy armor 60 pts for 60 seconds
8)Greater Ironclad: Light Armor- Fortify light armor 60 pts for 60 seconds
9)Hand of Salvation-A spell that paralyzes undead for 5 seconds. Doesn\'t affect living.
10)Healing Flames- Does 15  damage to undead, heals 15 pts on living.
11)Hydrohover-Harness the molecules in hydrogen to make it solid underneath your feet. Last for 30 seconds.
12)Ice Volley- Propel a shard of ice away from you at dazzling speed and force
13)Lesser Ironclad: Heavy Armor- Fortify heavy armor 30 pts for 60 seconds
14)Lesser Ironclad: Light Armor- Fortify light armor 30 pts for 60 seconds
15)Light Flurry-Shoot balls of light from your hands, killing undead only.
16)Magmatize Blood-Superheating the blood in your opponents body, the spell rips the magma like substance from their veins and forces it into your body to replenish health.
17)Paladin\'s Ire- Deal 15 damage to normal opponents, or 4x damage to undead
18)Purification Flames- A gout of blue flames.
19)Paladin\'s Healing Hands- Heal 200 pts on touch
20) Stendarr\'s Wraith- Bring down the wraith of Stendarr, dealing 20 pts/s

New Spells in v1.1:
21)Arcane Dart- Shoot a magic dart that does massive damage.
22)Desecrate- Soul Trap a large amount of creatures at once. Due to the unholy nature of the spell, it heals undead.
23)Force Scream- Using the power of the air waves, a shrill scream brings the people near you to their knees.
24)Greater Buama Tine- A huge bomb that does huge damage.
25)Hypothermia- As the freezing power of the spell forces the limbs to stop, the cold seeps into your bones doing damage.
26)Lesser Buama Tine- A lesser version of the Greater Buama Tine
27)Light Beam of Healing- Shoot a beam from your hand that heals the target.
28)Pyroblast- a Huge funnel of flame that does massive damage. A concentrated spell.
29)Shadow Walk- Call upon the powers of darkness to boot your stealth skills.
30)Teleport to Stendarr\'s Beacon

New in v1.2
31) Wind Rush- Shoot a ball of air that does damage and staggers.
-Fixed dialogue error that prevented buying the books.
-Added a barrel to my test cell.

All of these can be bought from a new trader, Ahrim, in the library of Winterhold.
========================================
2)Mod Usage
Feel free to use any of what I\'ve made in your own mods.
========================================
3)Installation
Drop the files into your data files folder. 
========================================
4)Credits and Contact
Credits go to me for all of it. Thanks to the people in the officials for the support and ideas.
Contact me at thepaladinof@gmail.com

Thanks! Have fun with it.
========================================
5)If you\'re updating from an old version, please delete the old .esp, go ingame, save, exit, then install these files.
Once you\'re back in-game, you will no longer have your old spells. If you want them back for free, type this in the console:

COC pal_spelltest

This will take you to my personal spell testing area. You can find all of the spells I have made or are working on on the
benches. However, I have set aside a barrel beside the tables filled with all of the current spells so that you can take
your previous spells back and then resume playing where you left off. Please do not abuse this kindness by stealing the 
spells. Just take the ones you had, and buy the rest from my trader. 

Thank you, sorry for any troubles.
author: ThePaladinOf
